parameters:
\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>Eh, what!? When did I get home? My, my smartphone...found
it!
\nc<Saki>Hii...there are so many missed calls from senpai...

\nc<Saki>To think I'd be knocked out after just one drink... Could it
be that senpai carried me back? Or was it the staff?

\nc<Saki>It's not my fault! It all happened because senpai is always
making people do so much work!

\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>My body feels a bit tingly too... Fueee, I don't want to go
to work...
